Name: httputil
Synopsis: Utilities for extracting and formatting data encountered in HTTP requests

Functions.Name: AddQ
Functions.Comment: Appends a query string from then given url.URL

Functions.Name: AddQString
Functions.Comment:
A version of AddQ that accepts a URL string and makes a best-effort to modify it.
Will return the modified URL or the original URL if an error occurred.
Functions.Signature: AddQString(u string, key string, value interface{}) string

Functions.Name: DecodeResponse
Functions.Comment:
Takes an http.Response and returns an io.Reader that will return the contents
of the Response Body decoded according to the values (if any) of the Content-Encoding
response header.

Functions.Name: DelQ
Functions.Comment: Deletes a query string from then given url.URL

Functions.Name: DelQString
Functions.Comment:
A version of DelQ that accepts a URL string and makes a best-effort to modify it.
Will return the modified URL or the original URL if an error occurred.

Functions.Name: EncodeBasicAuth
Functions.Comment: Encode the username and password into a value than can be used in the Authorization HTTP header.

Functions.Name: Is1xx
Functions.Comment: Returns whether the given status code is 100 <= s <= 199

Functions.Name: Is2xx
Functions.Comment: Returns whether the given status code is 200 <= s <= 299

Functions.Name: Is3xx
Functions.Comment: Returns whether the given status code is 300 <= s <= 399

Functions.Name: Is4xx
Functions.Comment: Returns whether the given status code is 400 <= s <= 499

Functions.Name: Is5xx
Functions.Comment: Returns whether the given status code is 500 <= s <= 599

Functions.Name: IsMediaType
Functions.Comment:
Returns whether the Content-Type of the given request matches any of the supplied options.
The mediaTypes arguments may be either complete media types (e.g.: "text/html", "application/javascript")
or major type classes (e.g.: "text/", "video/").  The trailing slash (/) indicates that any media type
that begins with that text will match.

Functions.Name: LoadCertPool
Functions.Comment: Loads certificates from the given file and returns a usable x509.CertPool

Functions.Name: MediaType
Functions.Comment: Returns the media type from the request's Content-Type.

Functions.Name: MultipartFormEncoder
Functions.Comment: Specifies that the given data should be encoded as a multipart/form-data request.

Functions.Name: ParseFormRequest
Functions.Comment: Parses the form values for a Request and unmarshals into the given value.

Functions.Name: ParseFormValues
Functions.Comment:
Parses a set of values received from an HTML form (usually the value of the
http.Request.Form property) and unmarshals into the given value.

Functions.Name: ParseJSON
Functions.Comment: Parses a given reader as a JSON document and unmarshals into the given value.

Functions.Name: ParseJSONRequest
Functions.Comment: Parses the Request as JSON and unmarshals into the given value.

Functions.Name: ParseRequest
Functions.Comment:
Autodetect the Content-Type of the given request and unmarshals into the
given value.

Functions.Name: Q
Functions.Comment: Parses the named query string from a request as a string.

Functions.Name: QBool
Functions.Comment: Parses the named query string from a request as a boolean value.

Functions.Name: QDuration
Functions.Comment: Parses the named query string from a request as a duration string.

Functions.Name: QFloat
Functions.Comment: Parses the named query string from a request as a float.

Functions.Name: QInt
Functions.Comment: Parses the named query string from a request as an integer.

Functions.Name: QStrings
Functions.Comment: Parses the named query string from a request as a delimiter-separated string slice.
Functions.Signature: QStrings(req *http.Request, key string, delimiter string, fallbacks ...string) []string

Functions.Name: QTime
Functions.Comment: Parses the named query string from a request as a date/time value.

Functions.Name: RequestGetValue
Functions.Comment: Retrieve an arbitrary value from the context of a given request.

Functions.Name: RequestSetValue
Functions.Comment: attach an arbitrary value to the context of a given request.

Functions.Name: RespondJSON
Functions.Comment:
Marshal the given data as a JSON document and write the output to the given ResponseWriter. If
a status is given, that will be used as the HTTP response status.  If data is an error, and no
status is given, the status will be "500 Internal Server Error"; if data is nil, the status will
be "204 No Content".  The Content-Type of the response is "application/json".

Functions.Name: SetContentTypeParser
Functions.Comment: Sets a parser implementation for the given HTTP content type.

Functions.Name: SetQ
Functions.Comment: Sets a query string to the given value in the given url.URL

Functions.Name: SetQString
Functions.Comment:
A version of SetQ that accepts a URL string and makes a best-effort to modify it.
Will return the modified URL or the original URL if an error occurred.
Functions.Signature: SetQString(u string, key string, value interface{}) string

Functions.Name: SetRootCABundle
Functions.Comment: Configures the given http.Client to accept TLS certificates validated by the given PEM-encoded CA bundle file

Functions.Name: UrlPathJoin
Functions.Comment:
UrlPathJoin takes a string or *url.URL and joins the existing URL path component with the given path.
The new path may also contain query string values, which will be added to the base URL.  Existing keys will
be replaced with new ones, except for repeated keys (e.g.: ?x=1&x=2&x=3).  In this case, the new values will
be added to the existing ones.  The *url.URL returned from this function is a copy, and the original URL (if
one is provided) will not be modified in any way.

Functions.Name: WaitForHTTP
Functions.Comment:
Periodically performs a GET request against the given URL, waiting up to timeout
for a 200-series HTTP response code.
Functions.Signature: WaitForHTTP(url string, timeout time.Duration, c ...*http.Client) error

Methods.Name: AppendTrustedRootCA
Methods.Comment: Append one or more trusted certificates to the RootCA bundle that is consulted when performing HTTPS requests.

Methods.Name: ClearHeaders
Methods.Comment: Remove all implicit HTTP request headers.

Methods.Name: ClearParams
Methods.Comment: Remove all implicit querystring parameters.

Methods.Name: Client
Methods.Comment: Returns the HTTP client used to perform requests

Methods.Name: Decode
Methods.Comment: Decode a response and, if applicable, automatically close the reader.

Methods.Name: Delete
Methods.Signature: Delete(path string, params map[string]interface{}, headers map[string]interface{}) (*http.Response, error)

Methods.Name: Get
Methods.Signature: Get(path string, params map[string]interface{}, headers map[string]interface{}) (*http.Response, error)

Methods.Name: GetWithBody
Methods.Signature: GetWithBody(path string, body interface{}, params map[string]interface{}, headers map[string]interface{}) (*http.Response, error)

Methods.Name: Headers
Methods.Comment: Return the headers set on this client.

Methods.Name: Params
Methods.Comment: Return the params set on this client.

Methods.Name: Post
Methods.Signature: Post(path string, body interface{}, params map[string]interface{}, headers map[string]interface{}) (*http.Response, error)

Methods.Name: Put
Methods.Signature: Put(path string, body interface{}, params map[string]interface{}, headers map[string]interface{}) (*http.Response, error)

Methods.Name: Request
Methods.Comment: Perform an HTTP request
Methods.Signature: Request(method Method, path string, body interface{}, params map[string]interface{}, headers map[string]interface{}) (*http.Response, error)

Methods.Name: SetBasicAuth
Methods.Comment: Set the username and password to be included in the Authorization header.

Methods.Name: SetClient
Methods.Comment: Replace the default HTTP client with a user-provided one

Methods.Name: SetDecoder
Methods.Comment: Specify a decoder that will be used to deserialize data in the response body.

Methods.Name: SetEncoder
Methods.Comment: Specify an encoder that will be used to serialize data in the request body.

Methods.Name: SetErrorDecoder
Methods.Comment: Specify a different decoder used to deserialize non 2xx/3xx HTTP responses.

Methods.Name: SetHeader
Methods.Comment:
Add an HTTP request header by name that will be included in every request. If
value is nil, the named header will be removed instead.

Methods.Name: SetInitHook
Methods.Comment:
Specify a function that will be called immediately before the first request is sent.
This function has an opportunity to read and modify the outgoing request, and
if it returns a non-nil error, the request will not be sent.

Methods.Name: SetInsecureTLS
Methods.Comment: Set or unset insecure TLS requests that will proceed even if the peer certificate cannot be verified.

Methods.Name: SetParam
Methods.Comment:
Add a querystring parameter by name that will be included in every request. If
value is nil, the parameter will be removed instead.

Methods.Name: SetPostRequestHook
Methods.Comment:
Specify a function tht will be called immediately after a response is received.
This function is given the first opportunity to inspect the response, and if it
returns a non-nil error, no additional processing (including the Error Decoder function)
will be performed.

Methods.Name: SetPreRequestHook
Methods.Comment:
Specify a function that will be called immediately before a request is sent.
This function has an opportunity to read and modify the outgoing request, and
if it returns a non-nil error, the request will not be sent.

Methods.Name: SetRootCA
Methods.Comment: Replace the existing RootCA bundle with an explicit set of trusted certificates.

Methods.Name: URI
Methods.Comment: Return the base URI for this client.

Methods.Name: WithDecoder
Methods.Comment: Return a copy of the current client that uses a different decoder.

Methods.Name: WithEncoder
Methods.Comment: Return a copy of the current client that uses a different encoder.

RequestLogger.Name: RequestLogger
RequestLogger.Comment: Deprecated: this type will go away in 1.9.x
